pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/vahtras/util.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/vahtras/util)[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/vahtras/util.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/vahtras/util)[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/vahtras/util/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/vahtras/util?branch=master)![Python package](https://github.com/vahtras/util/workflows/Python%20package/badge.svg)# blocked-matrix-utils## AboutThis package contains utilities for handling numpy arrays with subblocking.## Install The latest release versions can be installed from either pypi or conda-forge~~~ $ pip install blocked-matrix-utils~~~~~~ $ conda install -c conda-forge blocked-matrix-utils~~~Alternatively the latest development version is available on github~~~ $ pip install git+https://github.com/vahtras/util.git@master~~~
